articles.content:
he Employment and Labour Relations Court has suspended the appointment of Edward Gichana as the new Nairobi County Assembly clerk.

It had suspended last week’s gazettment of Mr Gichana by Speaker Beatrice Elachi as the new clerk to replace clerk Jacob Ngwele, pending the determination of an application filed in court by Mr Ngwele.

Mr Ngwele had gone to court yesterday seeking a conservatory order quashing the appointment of Mr Gichana on July 24, 2020 pending hearing and determination of his suit.
articles.title: Court suspends Edward Gichana's appointment as Nairobi Clerk
